pages.text: Are you going to become a pastry chef after all, in addition to your main job as an artist? These don't even look that bad (and surprisingly, they taste good too).$(br)Composed of amaranth, sugar, milk, and a four-leaf clover, it has a very special effect when eaten: you could notice that you had a little more yield when handling tools with Fortune, Looting and other random-based things.
